notes.text: gnutls was updated to fix a certificate algorithm consistency checking issue. (CVE-2015-0294)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: GnuTLS before 3.3.13 does not validate that the signature algorithms match when importing a certificate.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
